name: Lenovo H210 Wired Gaming Headset - 3.5mm Connection, Flip-to-Mute Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Breathable Ear Cups - Black
short_description: About this item All-Day Comfort: Designed for endurance gaming, the H210 is carefully crafted for comfort, with ultralight materials and soft, breathable cloth ear cups that can rotate and mold to your ears. They are also removeable and washable for optimal hygiene and long-lasting comfort Exceptionally Clear Audio: Experience uncompromising audio that is tuned to perfection and transmitted through premium 50mm audio drivers. Frequency - 20Hz-20KHz. Impedance - 32 ohms Noise Cancelling Earphones: Effortlessly control every aspect of your gaming experience with the H210’s intuitive volume control located on the earcup. Hear only what goes on within your system and leave the world behind Flip to Mute Microphone: The flip-to-mute unidirectional noise-canceling microphone lets you experience full immersion of your game from start to finish, without distraction Reliable Wired Connectivity: Our headset offers a 2m soft cable and 3.5mm wired connection for swift a plug-and-play attachment that always gives you a reliable connection  See more product details
product_description: The Lenovo H210 Gaming Headset is designed to satisfy the casual gamer without compromising on quality. Enjoy a rich listening experience, lightweight construction, breathable material, and thoughtful usability features all around. Wired Connectivity: 2m soft cable with single 3.5mm connection.
